WITH report_data AS ( SELECT supplier_payments.supplier_id, transaction_master.value_date AS posted_date, suppliers.supplier_name, '' AS bank_name, null::decimal AS bank, supplier_payments.amount as cash, supplier_payments.amount as total, transaction_master.statement_reference FROM purchase.supplier_payments LEFT JOIN inventory.suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_payments.supplier_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = supplier_payments.transaction_master_id WHERE transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND NOT transaction_master.deleted AND NOT suppliers.deleted AND transaction_master.office_id IN (SELECT get_office_ids FROM core.get_office_ids(@OfficeId::int)) AND COALESCE(supplier_payments.cash_repository_id, 0) > 0 AND COALESCE(supplier_payments.bank_id, 0) = 0 UNION ALL
SELECT supplier_payments.supplier_id, transaction_master.value_date AS posted_date, suppliers.supplier_name, bank_accounts.bank_account_name AS bank_name, supplier_payments.amount AS bank, null::decimal AS cash, supplier_payments.amount AS total, transaction_master.statement_reference FROM purchase.supplier_payments LEFT JOIN inventory.suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_payments.supplier_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = supplier_payments.transaction_master_id LEFT JOIN finance.bank_accounts ON bank_accounts.bank_account_id = supplier_payments.bank_id WHERE transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND NOT transaction_master.deleted AND NOT suppliers.deleted AND transaction_master.office_id IN (SELECT get_office_ids FROM core.get_office_ids(@OfficeId)) AND COALESCE(supplier_payments.cash_repository_id, 0) = 0 AND COALESCE(supplier_payments.bank_id, 0) > 0 ) SELECT * FROM report_data WHERE COALESCE(@SupplierId::integer, 0) = 0 OR supplier_id = @SupplierId::integer AND posted_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date ORDER BY posted_date;
